short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out which web technologies a site is built with

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WCMS detects a site's tech stack, primarily CMS software, by calling to the whatcms.org api. For any developer or aspiring web expert whose wondered how sites like Amazon, Home depot etc were built, knowledge of the stack is a huge bonus in gaining more understanding of web technologies.
